attributes.action: APPLY PUBLIC SERVICE CONDITIONS AND SALARIES ON BBC PRESENTERS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: CIVIL SERVANTS, PUBLIC SERVANTS BOTH FACE PAY FREEZES, THE BBC PAY VAST SALARIES TO PRESENTERS SUCH AS BRUCE FORSYTH, TESS DALY WHO BOTH GET PAID FAR MORE THAN THE PRIME MINISTER,AND MOST CIVIL SERVANTS AND PUBLIC SERVANTS. THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE, WE ALL PAY TOWARDS THE RUNNING COSTS, A LIMIT MUST BE SET, THEN MORE PROGRAMMES COULD BE COMMSIONED , KEEPING MORE ACTORS IN WORK,.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
